challenges.name: Intro to Classification
challenges.description: The first algorithm we are going to take a look at is Classification. Classification is a supervised learning algorithm. We can use linear regression to predict prices. Linear regression plots a line through number data points, that way to you can plot a line through data points that represent 2 parts of the data. For example, making a house price predictor you can plot a line through data that represents square feet of the house and the actual price. That way we can input any square feet value and get a prediction on the price of the house.
